about_the_game:
Purchasing this DLC will download the PDF file of the wizard from the witch forest setting set (phase II).

This series will introduce the adventures of wizards, and introduce the world outlook setting of the game, as well as the plot and character setting not released in the game.

The game plot and character setting are supplemented.

The DLC is the second issue of this series.
detailed_description:

The DLC is the second issue of this series.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
